definition: to research/to check/to investigate/to examine/to refer to/to look up (e.g. a word in a dictionary)
to check/to examine/to inspect/to exercise restraint

sentences.english: They should output something. Check if something goes wrong.
sentences.chinese: 屏幕上會輸出一些東西，請查檢是否有錯誤。

sentences.english: There are many homonyms, so you have to distinguish.
sentences.chinese: 其中有許多同形異義詞，查檢使用時須加分辨。

sentences.english: One of the safety precautions for this meeting is to check the attendants' accompanying articles.
sentences.chinese: 查檢與會者隨身物品是這次大會的安全措施之一。

sentences.english: The package sent to a search only after the staff packet.
sentences.chinese: 所寄發的包裹要工作人員查檢後才能封包。

sentences.english: The postman is going through the newspaper, and mail.
sentences.chinese: 郵遞員正在查檢信件和報刊。
